Question: Which FConcurrency*?
Constraint/Rule: if (FDbOperation*.featureDeleteDb) {FConcurrency* = dummyFeatureLocking;FEvictor = true;featureINCompressor = true;featureMemoryBudget = true;}if (FConcurrency*.featureLatch) {FConcurrency* = dummyFeatureLocking;FConcurrency* = featureCheckLeaks;FDbOperation* = featureDeleteDb;FEvictor = true;FPersistencyFeatures* = featureFileHandleCache;FConcurrency* = featureFSync;featureINCompressor = true;featureMemoryBudget = true;FStatisticsFeatures* = featureStatisticsLock;featureTreeVisitor = true;FDbOperation* = featureTruncateDb;featureVerifier = true;}if (featureLoggingFine) {FConcurrency* = dummyFeatureLocking;FEvictor = true;featureINCompressor = true;}if (!(!FLogging && !featureLoggingFinest)) {FConcurrency* = featureTransaction;}if (featureMemoryBudget) {FEvictor = true;FConcurrency* = featureLatch;}if (!(!FStatisticsFeatures*.featureStatisticsLock && !FStatisticsFeatures*.featureStatisticsTransaction)) {FConcurrency* = dummyFeatureLocking;}if (featureStatisticsEnvFSync) {FConcurrency* = featureFSync;}if (FStatisticsFeatures*.featureStatisticsTransaction) {FConcurrency* = featureTransaction;}if (FConcurrency*.featureTransaction) {FConcurrency* = dummyFeatureLocking;FDbOperation* = featureDeleteDb;FDbOperation* = featureTruncateDb;}
